quotes.quote: Take out the garbage... true happiness comes from within not from without.
12% of people with glasses wear them as an attempt to see better. 88% of people with glasses wear them as an attempt to appear smarter.
If you had weak eyes, they needed exercises to get strong. Glasses were like crutches. They prevented people with feeble eyes  from seeing the world on their own.

Everybody comes with prejudices, colored glasses on their eyes. Then they see everything colored according to their glasses. Yes, a few people come just like you, unprejudiced, without any idea gathered from yellow jounalism.
People who wear glasses, without them they always look unfocused, vulnerable. Out in the open. A layer removed.
You know, anyone who wears glasses, in one sense or another, is a cyborg.
Sometimes you've got to put your realistic glasses on and see who you are.
The greatest magnifying glasses in the world are a man's own eyes when they look upon his own person.
Do not expect the world to look bright, if you  habitually wear gray-brown glasses.
People have a tendency to see country life through rose-colored glasses.
Women have served all these centuries as looking glasses possessing the power of reflecting the figure of man at twice its natural size.
Don't call the world dirty because you forgot to clean your glasses.
Being sick feels like you're wearing someone else's glasses.
Girls with glasses aren't happy being nomads; they need a safe place to put their glasses while they sleep.
The moon is like a bar, we all fill our glasses the way we can.
When people think about computer science, they imagine people with pocket protectors and thick glasses who code all night.
A celebrity is a person who works hard all of their life to become well known, and then wears dark glasses to avoid being recognized.
People really give you a hard time when you wear fake glasses out to a bar.
Putting on a new pair of glasses or sunglasses is a simple way to completely transform your look - just like a new hairstyle.
It never gets old watching someone receive their first pair of glasses and regain their vision and their life.
A simple, well-proven surgery can restore sight to millions, and something even simpler, a pair of glasses, can make millions more see.
With the right glasses, a girl can conquer the world.
Life's too short to wear boring glasses.
